Metadata.title: Mystic AI - Your AI Fortune Teller
Metadata.description: Unlock your destiny with AI-powered Bazi, Tarot, and Face Reading.

Hero.subtitle: Ancient wisdom meets future intelligence. Discover what the stars hold for you today.

Services.label: Offerings
Services.title: Cosmic Services
Services.tarot_description: Digital interpretations of the arcana. Reveal your past, present, and future.
Services.face_description: Instant personality analysis via camera scanning technology.
Services.astrology_description: Real-time planetary alignment insights customized for your sign.

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.premium_desc: Get unlimited readings & deep analysis with Gold.

TarotSession.title: Three-Card Spread
TarotSession.oracle_intro:
The cards have aligned in the ethereal plane.

Before we begin, breathe deeply. Focus your energy on a question, or simply open your mind to what the universe wishes to show you.
TarotSession.oracle_reading_fallback: The cosmic energies are particularly strong today. The cards you've drawn speak of transformation and growth. Trust your intuition as you interpret their wisdom.
TarotSession.oracle_error: The ethereal connection was momentarily disrupted. Please try again, and the universe will share its wisdom.

FaceReading.title: AI Face Reading
FaceReading.hold_steady: Hold steady for accurate fortune mapping

Dashboard.title: Daily Fortune
Dashboard.alignment_msg: Your cosmic alignment is exceptionally strong today. Seize the momentum.
Dashboard.oracle_message: Today, Mercury aligns with your sector of communication. It is an excellent day to pitch that bold idea you've been nurturing. In love, patience is key—wait for them to make the first move before you reveal your hand.

BaziReport.title: Destiny Analysis
BaziReport.personality_insight: Your chart reveals a strong dominance of <fire>Yang Fire</fire>, suggesting a charismatic and passionate nature. You are a natural-born <highlight>leader</highlight> who thrives in the spotlight. However, the lack of Water indicates you may struggle with adaptability in rapidly changing environments. Your decision-making is swift, sometimes impulsive, driven by intuition rather than detailed analysis.
BaziReport.career_insight: The interaction between your Year and Month pillars points towards success in fields requiring <highlight>public speaking</highlight>, media, or entrepreneurship. The "Officer Star" in your chart is prominent, meaning you work best when you have autonomy. Avoid routine office jobs; you need a stage to perform.
BaziReport.wealth_insight: Wealth luck is indicated to arrive in your <white>middle age</white> (35-45). Your wealth element is Metal, which is currently weak but supported by the coming decade cycle. Focus on building <highlight>strategic partnerships</highlight> to bolster your financial foundations.

Tarot.landing_subtitle: Seek guidance from the cards. Choose a spread below to begin your reading and uncover the insights waiting for you.
Tarot.single_card_description: For quick guidance or a simple answer to a specific question.
Tarot.three_card_description: Explore the dynamics of Past, Present, and Future for a situation.
Tarot.focus_on_question: Focus on your question. When you're ready, draw a card.
Tarot.focus_on_question_three: Focus on your question. When you're ready, draw three cards.

the_fool.name: The Fool
the_fool.keywords: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, free spirit
the_fool.meaning_up: Represents new beginnings, taking risks, and embracing uncertainty. A journey into the unknown.
the_fool.meaning_rev: Recklessness, being taken advantage of, inconsideration, risk-aversion.

the_magician.name: The Magician
the_magician.meaning_up: Personal power, manifestation, and the ability to use one's skills and resources effectively.

the_high_priestess.name: The High Priestess
the_high_priestess.keywords: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind
the_high_priestess.meaning_up: Signifies intuition, deep wisdom, hidden knowledge, and spirituality.
the_high_priestess.meaning_rev: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal and silence.

the_empress.name: The Empress
the_empress.meaning_up: Suggests fertility, abundance, nurturing, and embracing the natural world.
the_empress.meaning_rev: Creative block, dependence on others, emptiness.

the_emperor.name: The Emperor
the_emperor.keywords: Authority, establishment, structure, a father figure
the_emperor.meaning_up: Represents authority, structure, stability, and the ability to organize and control.
the_emperor.meaning_rev: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline, inflexibility.

the_hierophant.name: The Hierophant
the_hierophant.keywords: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions
the_hierophant.meaning_up: Tradition, conformity, spiritual guidance, and seeking wisdom from established institutions.
the_hierophant.meaning_rev: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo.

the_lovers.name: The Lovers
the_lovers.keywords: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices
the_lovers.meaning_up: Signifies love, relationships, choices, and the need to find balance between emotions and reason.

the_chariot.name: The Chariot
the_chariot.meaning_up: Suggests determination, control, willpower, and overcoming obstacles to achieve success.
the_chariot.meaning_rev: Lack of control and direction, aggression.

strength.name: Strength
strength.meaning_up: Inner strength, courage, endurance, and the ability to harness and control powerful emotions.

the_hermit.name: The Hermit
the_hermit.keywords: Soul-searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance
the_hermit.meaning_up: Signifies introspection, solitude, soul-searching, and seeking answers from within.

wheel_of_fortune.name: Wheel of Fortune
wheel_of_fortune.keywords: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point
wheel_of_fortune.meaning_up: Destiny, fortune, success, elevation, luck, felicity.
wheel_of_fortune.meaning_rev: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles.

justice.name: Justice
justice.keywords: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law

the_hanged_man.name: The Hanged Man
the_hanged_man.keywords: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives
the_hanged_man.meaning_up: Surrender, letting go, sacrifice. Gaining a fresh perspective through changing one's viewpoint.

death.name: Death
death.meaning_up: Signifies transformation, change, and the end of one phase to make way for new beginnings.
death.meaning_rev: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging.

temperance.name: Temperance
temperance.meaning_up: Symbolizes moderation, harmony, patience, and finding a middle ground.

the_devil.name: The Devil
the_devil.meaning_up: Temptation, addiction, materialism, and the importance of freeing oneself from negative influences.

the_tower.name: The Tower
the_tower.keywords: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
the_tower.meaning_up: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, and the breaking down of old structures to create something new.
the_tower.meaning_rev: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster.

the_star.name: The Star
the_star.meaning_up: Signifies hope, inspiration, healing, and renewed faith in oneself and the universe.
the_star.meaning_rev: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection.

the_moon.name: The Moon
the_moon.meaning_up: Symbolizes intuition, dreams, illusions, and the need to trust one's instincts.
the_moon.meaning_rev: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion.

the_sun.name: The Sun
the_sun.meaning_up: Suggests happiness, success, abundance, and the warmth of unconditional love.
the_sun.meaning_rev: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic.

judgement.name: Judgement
judgement.meaning_up: Represents personal reflection, self-evaluation, rebirth, and redemption.
judgement.meaning_rev: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call.

the_world.name: The World
the_world.meaning_up: Signifies completion, fulfillment, wholeness, and the integration of all aspects of life.

Palmistry.title: Palmistry
Palmistry.subtitle: Uncover the secrets hidden in your hands. Our AI-powered palm reading provides insights into your character, love life, and destiny.
